TopicTitle: Land on Highest Point - Mun or Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Fairly simple premise, really. Land at the highest point you can find on either the Mun or Kerbin. No need to post coordinates - just the altitude. Screenshots would be nice.

I propose that the winner gets to name the mountain they land on.

Already done. Search for 'Kerbin Geographic Society thread'.

Actually - to be precise, the highest Mountain on Kerbin hasn\'t been confirmed so the challenge should be to disprove the claim that has already been made. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
